full_summary:
# EF245-231427 Invitation to Tender: Office Furniture

## Solicitation Number: WS3754817841
**Publication Date:** December 2, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 2, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of office furniture. The scope of the project entails the acquisition, delivery, and installation of category 1, 2, and 5 office furniture.

**Bid Requirements**
All bidder documentation and bid submissions must be received by 2 PM EST on December 2, 2022. Late submissions will be considered non-responsive.

**Contract Details**
* Contract type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Category: Office furniture (category 1, 2, 5 SA E60PQ-140003)
* Location: Montréal, Quebec, Canada
* Expected contract end date: August 1, 2023

**Trade Agreements**
This solicitation is subject to various trade agreements, including:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information**
For further information regarding this solicitation, please contact:

* Lisa-Marie Julien, PSPC
* Email: [lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

Note:
